attributes.action: provide ethical vaccines.  Most vaccines given to children are produced from tissue from aborted children, an example of such a vaccine is the MMR vaccine. We do not want vaccines that have inncocent aborted children's tissue!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some vaccines produced today have been produced using tissue from aborted children.  Parents are not told the truth about such vaccines and as parents we should demand vaccines to be produced that does not use aborted tissue.  Ethical vaccines can be produced and should be produced.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
